Name: Cinnamon Chicken
Directions:
Put 1 chicken breast in a pan of water and boil for 45 min to an hour. Cut up 1 onion and 2
cloves garlic, brown lightly. Add 1 tsp cinnamon, 3 bay leaves, ¼ tsp black pepper, 2 bouillon
cubes and 2-3 cups chicken broth. Add ½ cup tomato paste and meat from the chicken
breast, simmer ½ hour to 45 minutes. Serve over rice
